body: Actually I wasn't quite sure what to put here as well. The reference I had is pytorch/aten/src/ATen/native/cuda/Distributions.cu. When I talked to other developers about this, they told me "10 or 20 is a rough estimate on how many times the generator will be called. It's not ideal, but authors of those functions decided that it is good enough.".
